required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Analysis on AEFI Surveillance Data for Live Attenuated Varicella Vaccine

lead_sponsor.agency: Zhejiang Provincial Center for Disease Control and Prevention

collaborator.agency: Changchun Keygen Biological Products Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Zhejiang Provincial Center for Disease Control and Prevention

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to observe the occurrence of adverse events of live attenuated varicella vaccine.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 1 year after the first and second doses

study_pop.textblock: Participant preventive inoculation of varicella vaccine in 2014-2015

overall_official.affiliation: Zhejiang Provincial Center for Disease Control and Prevention

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Zhejiang Provincial Center for Disease Control and Prevention
